00014     
00023     public static function getInstance($name, $sendXMLHeader = true) {
00024         if ($sendXMLHeader) {
00025             header('Content-Type: text/xml');
00026         }
00027         return new MOC_XML_Node(sprintf('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><%1$s></%1$s>', $name));

00037     public function addCData($name, $value) { 
00038         $ChildNode = $this->addChild($name); //Added a nodename to create inside the function 
00039         $DomNode = dom_import_simplexml($ChildNode); 
00040         $DomOwnerDocument = $DomNode->ownerDocument; 
00041         $DomNode->appendChild($DomOwnerDocument->createCDATASection($value));
00042         return $ChildNode;
00043     }  
00044 }
